text: Bourton-on-the-Water is a large village and civil parish in Gloucestershire, England. It is surrounded by the Cotswolds Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty. 3,296 people live there making it a very large village, bigger than the nearby market towns of Burford and Stow-on-the-wold. Category:Villages in Gloucestershire Category:Civil parishes in Gloucestershire
title: Bourton-on-the-Water
